wordpressPost.title: God creates dinosaurs
wordpressPost.content:
God creates dinosaurs. God destroys dinosaurs. God creates Man. Man destroys God. Man creates Dinosaurs. Hey, you know how I’m, like, always trying to save the planet? Here’s my chance. God creates dinosaurs. God destroys dinosaurs. God creates Man. Man destroys God. Man creates Dinosaurs.

So you two dig up, dig up dinosaurs? You really think you can fly that thing? You know what? It is beets. I’ve crashed into a beet truck. Yeah, but your scientists were so preoccupied with whether or not they could, they didn’t stop to think if they should.

God help us, we’re in the hands of engineers. Hey, take a look at the earthlings. Goodbye! Life finds a way. Remind me to thank John for a lovely weekend. Yes, Yes, without the oops! They’re using our own satellites against us. And the clock is ticking.
